== Description ==
Retrieve the permalink for the post comments feed. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_post_comments_feed_link( $post_id, $feed ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$post_id|integer|Post ID.|optional|&#39;&#39;}}
{{Parameter|$feed|string|Feed type.|optional|&#39;&#39;}}
